SEARCH
Package BE

Class Server

java.lang.Object
BE.Server
public class Server extends Object
Represents the server managing various data and functionalities.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server(String filepath)
      Constructs a Server object and initiates the initialization process. The Server object manages various data structures and functionalities for the application.
      Parameters:
      filepath - The base filepath used to construct the file paths for data files.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public static void start()
      Initializes and starts the system by loading necessary data, managing inquiries, suggestions, points, passwords, camps, and other relevant information. This method orchestrates various operations such as loading student and staff data, handling inquiries and suggestions, calculating and updating suggestion points, managing passwords, camps, committee members, and reply points. It populates the system with loaded data and stores calculated points into respective files. The method handles exceptions related to file operations and data loading, printing stack traces in case of errors without interrupting the system's operation.

    • ChangeAndSavePasswords

      public void ChangeAndSavePasswords(User user, String password)
      Changes the password for the provided user and saves it to the passwords file.
      Parameters:
      user - The user for whom the password needs to be changed.
      password - The new password to be set for the user.

    • updatePointsFile

      public void updatePointsFile()
      Updates the points file with the current committee members' points data. This method saves the points information to the respective file.

    • login

      public User login(String userID, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on the provided userID and password.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user trying to log in.
      password - The password provided by the user for login.
      Returns:
      The User object if login is successful; null otherwise.

    • createCamp

      public Camp createCamp(Staff staff, String campName, ArrayList<String> dates, String registrationClosingDate, String userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, String description, int TotalcommitteeSlots, boolean v, int committeeslots, int memberslots)
      Creates a new camp with the provided details and adds it to the list of camps.
      Parameters:
      staff - The staff member creating the camp.
      campName - The name of the camp.
      dates - The dates associated with the camp.
      registrationClosingDate - The closing date for camp registration.
      userGroup - The user group for the camp.
      location - The location of the camp.
      totalSlots - The total available slots for the camp.
      description - The description of the camp.
      TotalcommitteeSlots - The total slots for committee members.
      v - A boolean value (unclear purpose).
      committeeslots - The available committee slots.
      memberslots - The available member slots.
      Returns:
      The newly created camp.

    • deleteCamp

      public boolean deleteCamp(Camp camp)
      Deletes the provided camp from the list of camps.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if deletion is successful, false otherwise.

    • editCamp

      public boolean editCamp(Camp camp, String campName, ArrayList<String> dates, String registrationClosingDate, String userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String description)
      Updates the details of the provided camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp to be edited.
      campName - The updated camp name.
      dates - The updated dates for the camp.
      registrationClosingDate - The updated registration closing date.
      userGroup - The updated user group for the camp.
      location - The updated location of the camp.
      totalSlots - The updated total available slots for the camp.
      campCommitteeSlots - The updated available committee slots for the camp.
      description - The updated description of the camp.
      Returns:
      True if edit is successful, false if the camp is not found.

    • findCampByName

      public Camp findCampByName(String campName)
      Finds a camp by its name.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp to search for.
      Returns:
      The camp if found, otherwise null.

    • getAllCamps

    • getAllAvailableCamp

      public ArrayList<Camp> getAllAvailableCamp(User user)

      Parameters:
      user - The user for whom available camps are being retrieved.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing available camps for the user.

    • loadTxTtoCamps

      public static ArrayList<Camp> loadTxTtoCamps(String filePath, ArrayList<User> usersData)
      Loads camps from a text file into the system.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path from which camps will be loaded.
      usersData - The list of users' data required for camp loading.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing camps loaded from the file.

    • viewAndReplyToInquiry

      public void viewAndReplyToInquiry(Student studentUser)
      Displays inquiries for a committee member student and allows them to reply to these inquiries. Points are awarded for replying to inquiries.
      Parameters:
      studentUser - The student user viewing and replying to inquiries

    • viewAndApproveSuggestions

      public void viewAndApproveSuggestions(Staff staffUser)
      Allows a staff member to view and approve suggestions made for camps created by them.
      Parameters:
      staffUser - The staff member who wants to view and approve suggestions

    • generateCampReport

      public void generateCampReport(Staff loggedInUser)
      Allows a staff user to generate various reports related to the camps they have created. Reports can be generated based on different criteria such as all camps created, specific camps, camps on particular dates, camps from specific locations, and camps involving specific students.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - The staff user initiating the report generation

    • generatePerformanceReport

      public void generatePerformanceReport(Staff loggedInUser)
      Generates a performance report for a specific camp created by a staff user. This method prompts the staff user to select a camp from the list of camps they've created and generates a performance report for all members of that camp.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - The staff user generating the performance report.

    • generateInquiryReport

      public void generateInquiryReport(Staff loggedInUser)
      Generates an inquiry report for a selected camp created by a staff member. The report is displayed on the screen and can be saved to a file.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - The Staff user generating the inquiry report.

    • generateCampReport

      public void generateCampReport(Student loggedInUser)
      Generates a camp report for the logged-in student user based on their committee memberships. It prompts the user to select a camp to generate a detailed report.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - The Student object representing the logged-in user.

    • generateInquiryCMReport

      public void generateInquiryCMReport(Student loggedInUser)
      Generates an inquiry report for the logged-in student user based on their committee memberships. It prompts the user to select a camp from their committee memberships to generate an inquiry report. The report displays inquiries related to the selected camp by the user.
      Parameters:
      loggedInUser - The Student object representing the logged-in user.
